definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Injection of macrophages and macrophage conditional medium can promote the optic nerve regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 注射巨噬細胞以及巨噬細胞調理液能促進視神經再生。

sentences.english: Injection of macrophages and macrophage conditional medium can promote the optic nerve regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 注射巨噬細胞以及巨噬細胞調理液能促進視神經再生。

sentences.english: Tingible body macrophages are present. No prominent nucleoli or irregular nuclear profiles are appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 出現可染小體巨噬細胞，未見明顯核仁或不規則核形。

sentences.english: Arbutin combined with glycyrrhizin could inhibit LTB4 release from rat peritoneal macrophage.
sentences.chinese: 兩藥合用可抑制大鼠腹腔巨噬細胞釋放LTB4。

sentences.english: Use the Giemsa staining method to detect the mouses peritoneal macrophages phagocytosis function.
sentences.chinese: 採用姬姆薩染色法檢測小鼠腹腔巨噬細胞的吞噬功能。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of damages of pulmonary alveolar macrophages caused by chrysotile asbestos.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討纖狀蛇紋石石棉致肺泡巨噬細胞受損的機制。

sentences.english: Removal of aged RBC normally occurs by phagocytosis by the fixed macrophages of the spleen.
sentences.chinese: 老化的紅細胞通常由脾臟巨噬細胞吞噬。

sentences.english: Unlike T lymphocytes, however, macrophages are not killed by the virus.
sentences.chinese: 然而，不像T淋巴細胞，巨噬細胞不會被病毒殺死。

sentences.english: The innate resistance thought to be related to the activity of macrophages .
sentences.chinese: 先天性抵抗力被認爲與巨噬細胞的活性有關。

sentences.english: Ultrastructurally, there were macrophages with numerous surface villous processes and lysosomes.
sentences.chinese: 超微結構示巨噬細胞有許多絨毛樣結構和溶酶體。

sentences.english: Methodology of separation, purification, cultivation and identification of rat bone marrow macrophage.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠骨髓巨噬細胞的分離，純化，培養以及鑑定。

sentences.english: Apoptotic cells expose phosphatidylserine and are swiftly engulfed by macrophages.
sentences.chinese: 凋亡細胞暴露出磷脂酰絲氨酸並迅速被巨噬細胞吞噬。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of macrophages on Schwann cell activity and proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 的研究巨噬細胞對雪旺氏細胞活性及增殖的影響。

sentences.english: Conclusion CRH could markedly improve the phagocytosis of rat enterocoelia macrophage.
sentences.chinese: 結論CRH能明顯提高大鼠腹腔巨噬細胞的吞噬能力。

sentences.english: The alveolar macrophage is particularly rich in the variety of proteolytic enzymes.
sentences.chinese: 肺泡巨噬細胞特別富含各種蛋白質水解酶。

sentences.english: The next two chapters cover measuring macrophage activity in vitro and in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 下一兩章包括在試管內和在活體內測量巨噬細胞活動。

definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
